message: Let's make a deal.  I take $60, you take $40.  It's a good offer, consider the inflation!
Let's be fair, Alice. I'll take a slight majority to account for the early rejection. This is a good deal before inflation eats away at it further.
Bob, my turn.  I'll take the slight majority this time, considering you rejected my previous offer. This is before inflation makes it worse for you!
